column4: can i use 2560x1440 16:9 aspect ratio wallpaper on 1920x1080 which is also 16:9 ?  would the picture degrade as wallpaper ?
i think you can choose that yourself, the best would be to edit the image with GIMP tho :)
you mean get the bigger size then resize it ?
yep but i think gnome or w/e you are using can to that for you (not sure tho)
